alert.note: Alert for West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 7:32AM CDT until March 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Band of heavy expected. Total snow accumulations of over 6 inches. * WHERE...West Otter Tail County, especially north of Fergus Falls. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
